content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I previously received a command from you to upgrade the "duolingo" package, but it was already installed. Recently, you executed a shell command which returned a warning about running pip as the \'root\' user and notified of a new release of pip. You also sent a command to execute a python file called "language_learning.py". Command analyze_code returned suggestions to add error handling and use a try-except block in case the request fails. Command execute_python_file returned an error regarding the \'duolingo\' module having no attribute \'Duolingo\'. You then sent a command to search for \'duolingo API changes\' on Google.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://github.com/KartikTalwar/Duolingo", "https://englishtest.duolingo.com/docs/api", "https://github.com/acSpock/duolingo-js", "https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/557761805", "https://www.reddit.com/r/duolingo/comments/w7dfjn/how_to_go_back_to_old_lessons_on_new_duolingo/", "https://httptoolkit.com/blog/inspect-any-android-apps-http/", "https://abc.duolingo.com/", "https://blog.duolingo.com/duolingo-max/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://github.com/KartikTalwar/Duolingo", "question": "Check if there have been any changes to the API that might be causing the error"}}}'}]
"""
